long_description: Pull on the versatile, quick-drying Royal Robbins Backcountry Skirt over your swimsuit for a walk to the beachfront cafe. Or, take a hike. Because it resists wrinkles, it's also great for travel. Fabric is 3-ply laundered Supplex(R) nylon that's durable, lightweight and wrinkle resistant yet feels as soft as cotton. Offers UPF 50+ sun protection. Adjustable button tabs at waist let you customize the fit. Front hand pockets; 1 front zip pocket; rear pocket with rip-and-stick closure. Royal Robbins Backcountry Skirt has an 18 in. length. Closeout.
short_description: Pull on the versatile, quick-drying Royal Robbins Backcountry Skirt over your swimsuit for a walk to the beachfront cafe. Or, take a hike. Because it resists wrinkles, it's also great for travel.
